<script type='text/javascript'>
  if(window.navmet===undefined) {
    window.navmet=[];
    if (window.performance && window.performance.timing && window.ue_t0) {
      var t = window.performance.timing;
      var now = + new Date();
      window.navmet.basic = {
        'networkLatency': (t.responseStart - t.fetchStart),
        'navFirstPaint': (now - t.responseStart),
        'NavStart': (now - window.ue_t0)
      };
      window.navmet.push({key:"NavFirstPaintStart",end:+new Date(),begin:window.ue_t0});
    }
  }
  if (window.ue_t0) {
     window.navmet.push({key:"NavMainStart",end:+new Date(),begin:window.ue_t0});

    <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com">

<script type="text/javascript">
var CSMReqs={af:{c:2,p:'atf'},cf:{c:2,p:'cf'}};
var DPTimestamps={mainImgRepl:{c:1}};
var prioritizeCriticalModules = true;
var setCSMReq = function(a){
    a=a.toLowerCase();
    var b=CSMReqs[a];

    if(--b.c==0){
        if(typeof b.f == 'function'){
            b.f();
        }
        else{
            if(typeof uet=='function'){uet(a);};

        if (a == 'af' && prioritizeCriticalModules){
            var featureElements = document.getElementsByClassName('dp-cif');
            if(featureElements.length){
                var priorityModuleList = ["A","jQuery"];
                var moduleMap = {
                    'A' : 1,
                    'jQuery' : 1
                };
                for (var i = 0; i<featureElements.length; i++){
                    if(featureElements[i].dataset && featureElements[i].dataset.dpCriticalJsModules){
                        var criticalJsModules = JSON.parse(featureElements[i].dataset.dpCriticalJsModules);
                        if(criticalJsModules) {
                            criticalJsModules.forEach(function(criticalJsModule,index){
                                if (!moduleMap[criticalJsModule]){
                                    moduleMap[criticalJsModule] = 1;
                                    priorityModuleList.push(criticalJsModule);
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    } else if (typeof featureElements[i].dataset === 'undefined'){
                        var criticalJsModules = JSON.parse(featureElements[i].getAttribute('data-dp-critical-js-modules'));
                        if(criticalJsModules) {
                            criticalJsModules.forEach(function(criticalJsModule,index){
                                if (!moduleMap[criticalJsModule]){
                                    moduleMap[criticalJsModule] = 1;
                                    priorityModuleList.push(criticalJsModule);
                                }
                            }); 
                        }   
                    }
                }

                if (P && P.setPriority && typeof P.setPriority === 'function' ) {
                    prioritizeCriticalModules = false;
                    P.setPriority(priorityModuleList);
                }
            }
        }
            if(typeof P != 'undefined'){
                P.register(b.p);
            };
        }
    }
}

var setDPTimestamp = function(a, t){
    var b=DPTimestamps[a];
    var w = window;
    if(b && --b.c===0){
        if (w.ue && typeof w.ue_t0 !== 'undefined' && typeof w.ue.count==='function') {
            w.ue.count(a, Date.now()-w.ue_t0);
            if(t && w.ue && w.ue.tag) {w.ue.tag(t);}
        }
    }
}

var addlongPoleTag = function(marker,customtag){
    marker=marker.toLowerCase();
    var b=CSMReqs[marker];
    if(b.c==0){
        if(window.ue && ue.tag) {ue.tag(customtag);}
    }
}


</script>

        P.register('sp.load.critical.js');
         P.now('sp.load.js').execute(function(jsObj){
             if(!jsObj){
                 P.declare('sp.load.js', {});
                 if (window.ue && ue.count) {
                     ue.count("jsLoadedAtStartMarkerCount", 1);
                 }
             }
         });
P.when('A', 'a-touch').execute(function(A, aTouch){
        var $ = A.$;

        A.on('a:popover:beforeSlideOut', function(){
                $(document).bind('click.a-secondary-view-block', function(e){
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopImmediatePropagation();

                        A.delay(function(){
                                $(document).unbind('click.a-secondary-view-block');
                        }, 600);
                });
                $(document).unbind('click.a-secondary-view-block');
        });
});
    window.isACRJumpLinkEnabled = 2;
</script>

<script>
window.logIfVideoSizeDiffCalled = false;
window.logIfVideoSizeDiff = function(containerHeight) {
try {
if (window.logIfVideoSizeDiffCalled) {
return;
}
window.logIfVideoSizeDiffCalled = true;
var videoWrapperHeight = ((document.getElementsByClassName('video-wrapper')[0]||{}).clientHeight||containerHeight);
var videoWrapperDifference = videoWrapperHeight - containerHeight;
if (videoWrapperDifference > 1) {
if (window.ue) {
window.ue.count("imageBlock-mobile-videoSizeDiff", 1);
}
if (window.ueLogError) {
var customError = { message: '[ImageBlock Video Size Diff: Video is larger than image-block; ASIN:B09TKLK5HM' };
var additionalInfo = {
logLevel: 'WARN',
attribution: 'imageBlock-mobile-videoSizeDiff'
};
window.ueLogError(customError, additionalInfo);
}
return true;
}
} catch (err) {
P.log('Fatal occurred in AibScript', 'FATAL', 'DetailPageMediaBlockTemplates');
}
return false;
}
var finalAltImageSizes = [[894, 1000], [894, 1000], [894, 1000], [894, 1000], [894, 1000], [894, 1000]];
var lastMainImageDims = lastMainImageDims === undefined ? finalAltImageSizes[0].slice() : lastMainImageDims;
var isAibScriptExecuted = false, aibImageWrappers, aibContainerHeight;
var aibMaxHeight = 290;
var aibMinHeight = 200;
function viewportDimension() {
var e = window,
a = 'inner';
if (!('innerWidth' in window)) {
a = 'client';
e = document.documentElement || document.body;
}
return {
width: e[a + 'Width'],
height: e[a + 'Height']
};
}
function getNewImgAndContDims(imgWidth, imgHeight, origHeight) {
var viewPortWidth = viewportDimension().width - 20;
var maxHeight = aibMaxHeight, minHeight = aibMinHeight;
var imageWrappers = document.querySelectorAll('.image-size-wrapper');
var index = imageWrappers.length-1;
while(index >=0 && imageWrappers[index].querySelector('.slate-image-table') != null) {
minHeight = Math.max(minHeight, imageWrappers[index].getAttribute("data-image-height"));
index--;
}
var newMainImageHeight = (imgHeight * viewPortWidth)/imgWidth;
newMainImageHeight = Math.min(Math.min(newMainImageHeight, origHeight), maxHeight);
var containerHeight = Math.min(Math.max(newMainImageHeight, minHeight), maxHeight);
return {
image: newMainImageHeight,
container: containerHeight
};
}
function aibEnlargeIB(d) {
if(!isAibScriptExecuted) {
try {
var scriptStartTime = Date.now(), scriptEndTime;
var landingImg = d.getElementById("main-image");
var mainImageHeight = landingImg.naturalHeight, mainImageWidth = landingImg.naturalWidth;
if (mainImageHeight == 1 && mainImageWidth == 1) {
return;
}
lastMainImageDims[0] = mainImageWidth;
lastMainImageDims[1] = mainImageHeight;
var newDims = getNewImgAndContDims(mainImageWidth, mainImageHeight, finalAltImageSizes[0][1]);
var newMainImageHeight = newDims.image;
aibContainerHeight = newDims.container;
aibImageWrappers = d.getElementById("image-block").querySelectorAll('.image-size-wrapper');
landingImg.style.height = newMainImageHeight+'px';
landingImg.style.width = ((mainImageWidth * newMainImageHeight)/mainImageHeight)+'px';
for (var i=0, len=aibImageWrappers.length; i< len; i++) {
if (!aibImageWrappers[i].classList.contains("aib-video-wrapper")) {
// Fix for https://sim.amazon.com/issues/SLDP-1979, as this causes
// an issue when the main images are small and video is wide
var height = aibContainerHeight;
var sitbStickerContainer = aibImageWrappers[i].querySelector("#sitb-sticker-container-inner") || aibImageWrappers[i].querySelector("#sitb-sticker-container");
if (sitbStickerContainer) {
height += sitbStickerContainer.clientHeight;
}
aibImageWrappers[i].style.height = height+'px';
}
}
var videoTable = d.getElementsByClassName("video-table");
for(var i=0, len=videoTable.length; i<len; i++) {
videoTable[i].style.height = aibContainerHeight+'px';
}
isAibScriptExecuted = true;
scriptEndTime = Date.now();
if (window.ue) {
window.ue.count("dp_aib_mob_js_exec_time", scriptEndTime-scriptStartTime);
}
if (window.logIfVideoSizeDiff) {
window.logIfVideoSizeDiff(aibContainerHeight);
}
} catch (err) {
var metricName = "aib_exp2_jsFailed";
var ue = window.ue;
if (ue) {
var existingValue = ue.count(metricName) || 0;
ue.count(metricName, existingValue + 1);
}
if (window.ueLogError) {
var jsError = {
logLevel: "ERROR",
attribution: "DetailPageAibJs",
message: "[DP][AIB][Exp2] JS Execution failed: " + JSON.stringify(err)
};
window.ueLogError(jsError);
}
} finally {
d.getElementById("main-image").style.visibility = "visible";
}
}
}
</script>
<script>
var markFeatureRenderExecuted = false;
function markFeatureRenderForImageBlock() {
try {
if (!markFeatureRenderExecuted) {
markFeatureRenderExecuted = true;
P.now().execute('dp-mark-imageblock',function(){
if (typeof window.markFeatureRender === 'function') {
var options={};
window.markFeatureRender('imageBlock',options);
}
});
}
} catch (err) {
P.log('Fatal occurred in markFeatureRenderForImageBlock', 'FATAL', 'DetailPageMediaBlockTemplates');
}
}
</script>

(function (d) {
try {
var landingImgContainer = d.getElementById("landing-image-wrapper");
var newDims = getNewImgAndContDims(lastMainImageDims[0], lastMainImageDims[1], finalAltImageSizes[0][1]);
var containerHeight = newDims.container;
var sitbStickerContainer = d.getElementById("sitb-sticker-container-inner") || d.getElementById("sitb-sticker-container");
var height = containerHeight;
if (sitbStickerContainer) {
height += sitbStickerContainer.clientHeight;
}
landingImgContainer.style.height = height + 'px';
} catch (err) {
P.log('Fatal occurred in AibScript', 'FATAL', 'DetailPageMediaBlockTemplates');
}
})(document);
P.when("A").execute(function (A) {
A.on(A.constants.BROWSER_EVENTS.RESIZE,
function () {
isAibScriptExecuted = false;
aibEnlargeIB(document);
A.trigger("imageBlockResize");
}
);
});

(function(d,w){
var logLatency = function(name) {
if(w.ue && w.ue.count && w.performance && w.performance.now) { w.ue.count(name, parseInt(performance.now())); }
}
function logCounter(name,value){
if(w.ue && w.ue.count){
w.ue.count(name,value || 1);
}
}
var altWT = "false";
var cl = d.getElementsByClassName("carousel-loader");

t.setAttribute("class", "white-bg");

cl[i].appendChild(l);
cl[i].appendChild(t);
}
}
}
P.when('a-carousel-framework').execute(function (f) {
f.createAll();
f.initializeAll();
});
P.now('image-block-initialised').execute(function(isImageBlockInitialised) {
if(!isImageBlockInitialised){
P.declare('image-block-initialised', true);
P.when('A', 'a-carousel-framework', 'jQuery').register('image-block-declarative',function(A, f, $) {
var ds = "#image-block-pagination-dots";
var ibAltImgNotShownName = "IBAltImageNotShown";
var ibCarouselSwipeName = "IBCarouselSwipe";
var beforeTwisterUpdate = true;
A.on('image-block-refresh',function () {
beforeTwisterUpdate=false;
ibAltImgNotShownName="TwisterUpdateIBAltImageNotShown";
ibCarouselSwipeName="TwisterUpdateIBCarouselSwipe";
});
f.onInit("image-block-carousel",function(p) {
if ($.isFunction(window.markFeatureInteractive)) {
window.markFeatureInteractive('imageblock',{
events:['swipe']
});
}
logLatency("dpmob_carouselInitialized");
$('#loadingImages').hide();
$(ds).show();
selectDot(1);
});
function selectDot(index) {
var dots = $(ds+' li');
if (dots.length > 0) {
dots.removeClass('a-selected');
dots.eq(index-1).addClass('a-selected');
}
}
A.on("a:image:load:altImage",function(){
if(beforeTwisterUpdate){
logLatency('IBAltImageHigResDownloadTime')
}
});
A.on("a:carousel:image-block-carousel:change:pageNumber", function(p) {
if (p.oldValue !== p.newValue) {
selectDot(p.newValue);
}
logCounter(ibCarouselSwipeName, 1);
if(A.$("#image-block .image-wrapper").length> 0){
var elem = A.$("#image-block .image-wrapper")[p.newValue-1];
if(elem){
var img=$(elem).find('.carousel-alt-img');
if(img.length>0 && !img[0].complete){
logCounter(ibAltImgNotShownName, 1);
}
}
}
});
});
}
});
if(true) {
P.when('A','jQuery').execute(function(A, $) {
var ib = "#image-block .carousel-img-manual-load";
var $altImages = $(ib);
var len = altWT === "true" ? $altImages.length : 1;
for (var i=0; i<($altImages.length>0 ? len:0); i++) {
var url = $altImages[i].src || $($altImages[i]).data("a-image-source");

if (imgUrl) {
var $altImPar = $($altImages[index]).parent();
var i = new Image();
i.onload = function() {
$altImPar.find('.carousel-loader').remove();
logLatency('altImageDownlaodTime');
logLatency("dpmob_alt_image_"+(index+1)+"_ready");
};
i.src = imgUrl;
}
}(i, url));
}
altWT === "true" ? A.loadImageManually($(ib)) : A.loadImageManually($($(ib)[0]));
});
}
})(document, window);

P.execute('twister-plus-mobile-inline-twister-mark-render', function(){
if (typeof window.markFeatureRender === 'function') {
var nonSingletonDimensionLength =2;
var options = {};

options.isInteractive = false;

options.hasComponents = true;

name: twisterComponent
}];
}

}
});

<script type="text/javascript">
P.when("A", "jQuery").execute(function(A, $) {
$("#selectQuantity [name='quantity'], #mobileQuantityDropDown").live("change", function (event) {
if (event.updatePromiseBadgeOnQuantityChange) {
return;
}
event.updatePromiseBadgeOnQuantityChange = 1;
// "#buybox" is included in this list because if there is no accordion row, then it is a single-offer layout
// possible id's may include "usedAccordionRow", "newAccordionRow_1", "newAccordionRow_2"
var accordionRow = $(this).closest('[id$="AccordionRow"], #buybox, [id^="newAccordionRow"]');
var quantity = $(this).val();
// This asin and merchantId will support use case in US marketplace.
// DDM will be required here to support the feature in IN marketplace
var asin = accordionRow.find("#deliveryBlockSelectAsin").val();
var merchantId = accordionRow.find("#deliveryBlockSelectMerchant").val();
if (!asin) {
asin = accordionRow.find("#ftSelectAsin").val();
}
if (!merchantId) {
merchantId = accordionRow.find("#ftSelectMerchant").val();
}
if (!asin || !quantity) {
return;
}
var params = [];
params.push("asin=" + asin);
params.push("quantity=" + quantity);
params.push("exclusiveMerchantId=" + merchantId);
params.push("merchantId=" + merchantId);
params.push("clientId=retailwebsite");
params.push("deviceType=web");
params.push("showFeatures=priceBlockMs3Mir");
params.push("ie=UTF8");
params.push("experienceId=priceBadgingQuantityRefreshAjaxExperience");
// Weblab gated addition of Locale to QuantityRefresh request
var addLocaleToQuantityRefreshWeblabFlag = false;
if (addLocaleToQuantityRefreshWeblabFlag) {
var locale = accordionRow.find("#deliveryBlockSelectLocale").val();
// Only add language param if locale is non-null
if (locale) {
params.push("language=" + locale);
}
}
$.ajax({
type: "GET",
url: "/gp/product/ajax?",
contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8',
data: params.join('&'),
accordionRow: accordionRow,
dataType: "html",
success: function (objResponse) {
if (objResponse != null && objResponse != "") {
accordionRow.find("#priceBadging_feature_div").replaceWith(objResponse);
// If it's a single buying option layout or the new buy box quantity changed, update data outside the buy box
if ($("#buyBoxAccordion, #buybox").children().length === 1 || accordionRow.attr("id").match(/^newAccordionRow/)) {
$("#price #priceblock_ourprice_row #ourprice_shippingmessage #priceBadging_feature_div").replaceWith(objResponse);
$("#newOfferShippingMessage_feature_div #ourPrice_availability #priceBadging_feature_div").replaceWith(objResponse);
$("#price #priceblock_saleprice_row #saleprice_shippingmessage #priceBadging_feature_div").replaceWith(objResponse);
$("#price #priceblock_dealprice_row #dealprice_shippingmessage #priceBadging_feature_div").replaceWith(objResponse);
}
}
}
});
return;
});
});
</script>                             </div>                                                     <div id="freeShippingPriceBadging_feature_div" data-csa-c-asin="" data-csa-c-content-id="freeShippingPriceBadging" data-csa-c-is-in-initial-active-row="false" data-csa-c-slot-id="freeShippingPriceBadging_feature_div" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-feature-name="freeShippingPriceBadging" data-template-name="freeShippingPriceBadging" class="a-section a-spacing-none celwidget t-prnt t-full">                   <dptags:queryLogOperation methodName="addCount" metric="FSPB:COMMON:JSP_RENDER:renderCount" />

P.when("A", "load").execute("aod-assets-loaded", function(A){
function logAssetsNotLoaded() {
if (window.ueLogError) {
var customError = { message: 'Failed to load AOD assets for WDG: pc_display_on_website, Device: mobile' };
var additionalInfo = {
logLevel : 'ERROR',
attribution : 'aod_assets_not_loaded'
};
ueLogError (customError, additionalInfo);
}
if (window.ue && window.ue.count) {
window.ue.count("aod-assets-not-loaded", 1);
}
}
function verifyAssetsLoaded() {
var assetsLoadedPageState = A.state('aod:assetsLoaded');
var logAssetsNotLoadedState = A.state('aod:logAssetsNotLoaded');
if((assetsLoadedPageState == null || !assetsLoadedPageState.isAodAssetsLoaded)
&& (logAssetsNotLoadedState == null || !logAssetsNotLoadedState.isAodAssetsNotLoadedLogged)) {
A.state('aod:logAssetsNotLoaded', {isAodAssetsNotLoadedLogged: true});
logAssetsNotLoaded();
}
}
setTimeout(verifyAssetsLoaded, 50000)
});

<script type="text/javascript">
(function(d,w){
var url = "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/61U41wyX3sL._AC_UF894,1000_QL80_.jpg";
var i = new Image();
i.onload = function () {
var img = d.getElementById("main-image");
if (img) {
img.src = url;
var imgWidth = img.width;
var imgHeight = img.height;
var hiResWidth = img.naturalWidth;
var hiResHeight = img.naturalHeight;
try {
var hiResHeightGood = (imgWidth / hiResWidth) * hiResHeight;
var heightDistortion = (Math.abs(hiResHeightGood - imgHeight) / imgHeight).toFixed(2);
if (heightDistortion > .01) {
if (window.ue) {
window.ue.count("imageBlock-mobile-hi_res", 1);
}
if (window.ueLogError) {
var customError = { message: '[ImageBlock Hi-Res: Size distortion. ASIN:B09TKLK5HM Diff:' + heightDistortion.toString() + ']' };
var additionalInfo = {
logLevel: 'WARN',
attribution: 'imageBlock-mobile-hi_res'
};
window.ueLogError(customError, additionalInfo);
}
}
}
catch (e) {
if (window.ueLogError) {
var additionalInfo = {
logLevel: 'WARN',
attribution: 'imageBlock-mobile-hi_res'
};
window.ueLogError(e, additionalInfo);
}
}
}
w.setDPTimestamp("mainImgRepl", img ? "inlineScript2" : "mainImgNotFound");
}
i.src = url;
})(document,window);

P.when('jQuery').register('airy-image-block', function($) {
var shouldDetachExitFullScreen = false;
var currentIndex = 0;
var currentVideoIndex = 0;
var curContext;
var videoIndexPlayedPV = {};
var videoIndexPlayedIV = {};
var newAiryConfig = null;
var updateStateElement = $('#image-block');
return {
updateStateForAction : function($carousel, index, airyConfig) {
if (!airyConfig) {return;}
var airyInstance = airyConfig.instance;
if (airyInstance) {
airyInstance.pause();
}
currentVideoIndex = index;
curContext = airyConfig.contextName;
var $selectedCarouselItem = $carousel
.find('li.a-carousel-card')
.eq(index - 1);
var $playerContainer = $selectedCarouselItem.find('.airy-player-container');
if (!$playerContainer.length) {
return;
}
if (airyInstance) {
this._attachAndLoadMedia(airyInstance, $playerContainer);
return;
}
P.when('Airy').execute(function() {
airyInstance = this._embed($playerContainer, airyConfig.contextName);
airyConfig.embeddedCallback(airyInstance);
}.bind(this));
},
_embed : function($playerContainer, contextName) {
var $videoMetadata = $('#image-block-video-metadata');
var foresterParams = $videoMetadata.data('forester-params');
if (contextName != null) {
foresterParams.method += '.' + contextName;
}
var airyInstance;
var that = this;
var playerConfig = {
foresterMetadataParams : foresterParams,
mediaSourceInfo : $playerContainer.data('video-url'),
parentElement : $playerContainer[0],
bindings : {
screenchange : function() {
var airyConfig = that.getNewAiryConfig();
if(airyConfig) {
airyInstance = airyConfig.instance;
if(airyInstance && !airyInstance.isFullScreen() && that.shouldDetachOnExitFullScreen()) {
that.setShouldDetachOnExitFullScreen(false);
that._detachAiryInstance(airyInstance);
that.updateStateForAction(that.getUpdateStateElement(), that.getCurrentIndex(), that.getNewAiryConfig());
}
}
},
normalscreen : function() {
if(!airyInstance && airyConfig) {
airyInstance = airyConfig.instance;
}
},
play : function() {
var inImmersive = curContext === 'ImmersiveView';
var videoMap = inImmersive ? videoIndexPlayedIV : videoIndexPlayedPV;
var metric = inImmersive ? "dpmob_videoPlayedIV" : "dpmob_videoPlayedPV";
if (!videoMap[currentVideoIndex]) {
videoMap[currentVideoIndex] = true;
if(window.ue && ue.count) { ue.count(metric); }
}
airyInstance.enterFullScreen({isAsync : true});
},
uiready : function() {
}
},
installFlashButtonText : "Install Flash Player",
installFlashPrompt : "Adobe Flash Player is required to watch this video.",
playbackErrorPrompt : "Sorry, an error has occurred while attempting video playback. Please try again later.",
videoUnsupportedPrompt : "Sorry, this video is unsupported on this browser.",
ageGate : {
deniedPrompt : "We are sorry. You are not old enough to watch this video.",
monthNames : [
"January",
"February",
"March",
"April",
"May",
"June",
"July",
"August",
"September",
"October",
"November",
"December"
],
prompt : "This video is not intended for all audiences. What is your birthdate?",
submitText : "Submit",
regionCode : "eu"
}
};
this._addSlateImageToPlayerConfig($playerContainer, playerConfig);
airyInstance = Airy.embed(playerConfig);
return airyInstance;
},
_attachAndLoadMedia : function(airyInstance, $playerContainer) {
if (!airyInstance) { return; }
airyInstance.attach($playerContainer[0]);
this._loadMedia(airyInstance, $playerContainer);
},
_loadMedia : function(airyInstance, $playerContainer) {
if (!airyInstance) { return; }
var videoUrl = $playerContainer.data('video-url');
if (airyInstance.getMediaSourceInfo() === videoUrl) { return; }
var loadMediaConfig = {
mediaSourceInfo : videoUrl
};
this._addSlateImageToPlayerConfig($playerContainer, loadMediaConfig);
airyInstance.loadMedia(loadMediaConfig);
},
_addSlateImageToPlayerConfig : function($playerContainer, playerConfig) {
var slateUrl = $playerContainer.data('slate-url');
var $slateImage = $playerContainer.find('.image-size-wrapper');
var slateUrlMatchesImageUrl = $slateImage.find('img').attr('src') === slateUrl;
var slateImageValue = slateUrlMatchesImageUrl ? $slateImage[0] : slateUrl;
playerConfig.slateImages = {
preloadSlate : slateImageValue
};
},
_detachAiryInstance : function(airyInstance) {
if (airyInstance && !airyInstance.isDetached() && !airyInstance.isFullScreen()) {
airyInstance.detach({isAsync : true});
}
},
setShouldDetachOnExitFullScreen : function(shouldDetach) {
shouldDetachExitFullScreen = shouldDetach;
},
shouldDetachOnExitFullScreen : function() {
return shouldDetachExitFullScreen;
},
_resizeIVCarousel : function() {
if($('#immersive-main img').length > 0){
var mainCarouselHeight = getMainCarouselHeight();
$('#immersive-main').css('height',mainCarouselHeight+'px');
$('#immersive-main ol').css('height',mainCarouselHeight+'px');
$('#immersive-main div.a-carousel-viewport').each(function(){
$(this).css('height',mainCarouselHeight+'px');
});
$('#immersive-main li.a-carousel-card').each(function(){
$(this).css('height',mainCarouselHeight+'px');
});
$('#immersive-main img').each(function(){
$(this).css('max-height',mainCarouselHeight+'px');
});

function verifyAssetsLoaded() {

var logAssetsNotLoadedState = A.state('aod:logAssetsNotLoaded');

logAssetsNotLoaded();
}

<div id="addtionalProductDetails_exp_T2" class="celwidget" data-feature-name="addtionalProductDetails_exp_T2"
data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-content-id="addtionalProductDetails_exp_T2"

<div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-text-center">                               <img alt="15 oled" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-spacing-mini a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/95955888-8b2c-44d4-911b-65be2335141d.__CR0,0,970,300_PT0_SX970_V1___.jpg"/><noscript><img alt="15 oled" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/95955888-8b2c-44d4-911b-65be2335141d.__CR0,0,970,300_PT0_SX970_V1___.jpg"/></noscript>   </div>                                                                     </div>    </div>
<div class="celwidget aplus-module module-8 aplus-standard" cel_widget_id="aplus-m-module-8">
<div class="aplus-module-wrapper">
<div>
<div class="a-text-center">
<img alt="15 oled" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-spacing-mini a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/3b891e7a-a500-4f53-bb4f-2ffb7d5c1fc7.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/><noscript><img alt="15 oled" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/3b891e7a-a500-4f53-bb4f-2ffb7d5c1fc7.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/></noscript>   </div>
<div>
<h3 class="a-spacing-mini"> ASUS Vivobook 15 OLED </h3>                                   <h5 class="a-spacing-mini a-color-secondary"> Let your Vision Shine </h5>                                  <p class="a-spacing-base"> Everything is smoother with the powerful ASUS Vivobook 15 OLED, the feature-packed laptop. Everything’s easier too, thanks to user-friendly features including a 180° lay-flat hinge, a physical webcam shield and dedicated function keys to turn your mic and camera on or off. Your health is in safe hands with ASUS Antimicrobial Guard Plus protecting frequently-touched surfaces, and the bigger touchpad is now more finger-friendly. Enjoy the smooth power of Vivobook 15 OLED! </p>                                                                                                                                       </div>
</div>
<div>
<div>
<h4> Features at a glance... </h4>   <div class="a-box a-spacing-small a-color-alternate-background apm-listbox"><div class="a-box-inner">                             <ul class="a-unordered-list a-vertical">   <li><span class="a-list-item"> <span class="a-size-base"> 15.6&#034; Full HD OLED 400nits Screen </span> </span></li>   <li><span class="a-list-item"> <span class="a-size-base"> Powered by Intel&#039;s 13th Generation Core i7-1355U Processor </span> </span></li>   <li><span class="a-list-item"> <span class="a-size-base"> 16GB RAM paired with 1TB PCIe 3.0 SSD storage </span> </span></li>   <li><span class="a-list-item"> <span class="a-size-base"> UK layout backlit keyboard </span> </span></li>   <li><span class="a-list-item"> <span class="a-size-base"> Ships with 3-pin UK plug </span> </span></li>   <li><span class="a-list-item"> <span class="a-size-base"> ASUS webcam shield for instant privacy </span> </span></li>   <li><span class="a-list-item"> <span class="a-size-base"> Treated with ASUS Antimicrobial Guard Plus </span> </span></li>   <li><span class="a-list-item"> <span class="a-size-base"> Stringently tested to US Military-grade durability </span> </span></li>  </ul> </div></div>  </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="celwidget aplus-module module-9 aplus-standard" cel_widget_id="aplus-m-module-9">
<div class="aplus-module-wrapper">
<div class="">
<p class="a-text-center">                               <img alt="connectivity" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-spacing-mini a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/ab2bad2c-614a-4b67-a31d-7259835e85b0.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/><noscript><img alt="connectivity" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/ab2bad2c-614a-4b67-a31d-7259835e85b0.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/></noscript>   <br/>
<p class="a-spacing-base"> Vivobook 15 keeps you fully connected with its comprehensive I/O ports. There are one USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a USB 2.0 port, HDMI output and an audio combo jack — so it’s easy to connect all your existing peripherals, displays and projectors. </p>    </p> <p class="a-text-center">                               <img alt="thermal" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-spacing-mini a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/94a9c158-ec3f-4dfb-8bb8-c2a2717eeb7b.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/><noscript><img alt="thermal" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/94a9c158-ec3f-4dfb-8bb8-c2a2717eeb7b.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/></noscript>   <br/>
<h4 class="a-spacing-mini"> Cooler, quieter and faster! </h4>                                  <p class="a-spacing-base"> To keep it cool in all situations, the Vivobook 15 OLED uses an IceBlade fan and dual air vents to efficiently accelerate heat transfer for smooth, stable performance without processor throttling. </p>    </p> <p class="a-text-center">                               <img alt="performance" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-spacing-mini a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/cc34d329-31bc-40a6-94a5-e6e94739fd3e.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/><noscript><img alt="performance" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/cc34d329-31bc-40a6-94a5-e6e94739fd3e.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/></noscript>   <br/>
<p class="a-spacing-base"> Vivobook 15 OLED helps you complete all your tasks faster than ever, whether it’s at work, at home, or out and about. The 13th Gen Intel Core processors with 16 GB of fast memory, 1TB of speedy SSD storage and WiFi 6 make everything effortless. </p>    </p> </div>
</div>    </div>
<div class="celwidget aplus-module module-9 aplus-standard" cel_widget_id="aplus-m-module-9">
<div class="aplus-module-wrapper">
<div class="">
<p class="a-text-center">                               <img alt="antimicro" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-spacing-mini a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/32622b21-c966-4584-ac56-f7c865f5bd20.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/><noscript><img alt="antimicro" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/32622b21-c966-4584-ac56-f7c865f5bd20.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/></noscript>   <br/>
<h4 class="a-spacing-mini"> Silver ions prevents 99% reproduction </h4>                                  <p class="a-spacing-base"> ASUS Antimicrobial Guard Plus is applied to frequently touched areas of your laptop to help keep it hygienic. This technology uses a denser treatment* that inhibits viruses and bacteria. And it is scientifically shown — using the ISO 21702 and 22196 standards — to inhibit virus and bacteria growth by more than 99% over a 24-hour period. Strains used for the tests include the SARS-CoV-2, H3N2 (Influenza A) and the E. coli bacterium. </p>    </p> <p class="a-text-center">                               <img alt="user experience" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-spacing-mini a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/cba12bcc-4b18-4fab-b866-7268e474d887.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/><noscript><img alt="user experience" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/cba12bcc-4b18-4fab-b866-7268e474d887.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/></noscript>   <br/>
<h4 class="a-spacing-mini"> Wide open for sharing </h4>                                  <p class="a-spacing-base"> Vivobook 15 OLED features a precision-engineered, lay-flat hinge that makes it easy to share content with others, or collaborate with a group of people around a table. </p>    </p> <p class="a-text-center">                               <img alt="enviroment" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-spacing-mini a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/7b8182df-5325-4924-a61d-ac6afa7b1dca.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/><noscript><img alt="enviroment" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/7b8182df-5325-4924-a61d-ac6afa7b1dca.__CR0,0,300,300_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg"/></noscript>   <br/>
<h4 class="a-spacing-mini"> Made for the Earth. Made for you </h4>                                  <p class="a-spacing-base"> ASUS is committed to driving progress toward a more sustainable future. Vivobook 15 incorporates sustainable materials in the product and its packaging. Top ecolabels and compliance, ENERGY STAR, and RoHS, prove our commitment to protecting the earth and giving you the best. </p>    </p> </div>
</div>    </div>
</div> </div> </div>                               </div>

<div class="a-section a-spacing-none cm-cr-truncated-reviews mostHelpfulReviewsFeature"><div id="cm-cr-dp-aw-review-header" class="a-section a-spacing-large"><h3 class="mostHelpfulReviewsTitle">Top reviews from United Kingdom</h3></div><span class="cr-translate-cta">

<div id="cm-cr-dp-reviews-loading-wrapper" class="a-row a-spacing-medium aok-hidden"><div class="a-spinner-wrapper cr-reviews-loading aok-hidden"><span class="a-spinner a-spinner-medium"></span></div></div><div id="cm-cr-dp-aw-review-list" class="a-row celwidget filterable-reviews-content"><style>

<div id="RLV1L5RFCVVCU" data-hook="mobley-review-content" class="a-section a-spacing-large aok-relative"><div data-hook="genome-widget" class="a-row"><a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AFCR45HBYHB5WFKL2WJQB6NXPY2Q/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_gw_tr?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX110_.png"/><noscript><img src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX110_.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Shigaru</span></div></a></div><div id="customer_review-RLV1L5RFCVVCU" class="a-section celwidget"><div class="a-row a-spacing-micro a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star-small a-star-small-5 review-rating aok-align-center"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span data-hook="msrp-avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></div><span data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base review-title-content a-color-base a-text-bold">
<span>Overall a really nice laptop with just one gripe for me</span>
</span><div data-hook="review-by-line" class="a-row a-spacing-none reviewByLine"><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary review-date">Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 July 2024</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary">Style Name: E1504GA<i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Configuration: Intel i3-N305 + 8GB RAM + 512GB SSD</span></div><span class="cr-original-truncatable-content">
<div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-truncated-content"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
I recently purchased the ASUS Vivobook 15 E1504GA and overall, I'm very satisfied. The 15.6" Full HD display is crisp and clear with excellent on-screen colors, making it a pleasure to use for both work and entertainment. The Intel i3 8-core processor with 8GB...
</span><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-declarative" data-action="reviews:toggle-class:click" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-reviews:toggle-class:click" data-reviews:toggle-class:click="{&quot;cssClass&quot;:&quot;aok-hidden&quot;,&quot;selector&quot;:&quot;#customer_review-RLV1L5RFCVVCU .cr-truncated-content, #customer_review-RLV1L5RFCVVCU .cr-full-content&quot;}"><a data-hook="redirect-see-more" aria-label="Toggle full review text" class="a-link-normal a-nowrap a-text-normal" href="/gp/aw/review/B09TKLK5HM/RLV1L5RFCVVCU/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_rvw_tr?ie=UTF8"><span class="a-size-base cr-read-more">See more</span></a></span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-full-content aok-hidden"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
I recently purchased the ASUS Vivobook 15 E1504GA and overall, I'm very satisfied. The 15.6" Full HD display is crisp and clear with excellent on-screen colors, making it a pleasure to use for both work and entertainment.<br /><br />The Intel i3 8-core processor with 8GB RAM ensures smooth performance for my daily tasks, and the 512GB PCIe SSD offers ample storage and fast boot times. The laptop is light and slim, which makes it easy to carry around.<br /><br />My only gripe is the speakers, which are a bit too low for watching movies or videos, especially with background noise. Despite this, it's a great laptop for general use, running Windows 11 seamlessly.
</span></div></span>

class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Supersaw</span></div></a></div><div id="customer_review-R39XRRPF81FPZG" class="a-section celwidget"><div class="a-row a-spacing-micro a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star-small a-star-small-5 review-rating aok-align-center"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span data-hook="msrp-avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></div><span data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base review-title-content a-color-base a-text-bold">
<span>Bargain Laptop</span>
</span><div data-hook="review-by-line" class="a-row a-spacing-none reviewByLine"><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary review-date">Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 August 2024</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary">Style Name: P1504CZA<i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Configuration: Intel i3-1215U + 8GB RAM + 512GB SSD</span></div><span class="cr-original-truncatable-content">
<div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-truncated-content"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
I bought my partner a Asus laptop thirteen years ago which still works perfectly so thought I'd buy one for myself! The laptop appears to be very well built and runs windows 11 (which I dislike immensely) with ease. I think it would be more than adequate for most users...
</span><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-declarative" data-action="reviews:toggle-class:click" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-reviews:toggle-class:click" data-reviews:toggle-class:click="{&quot;cssClass&quot;:&quot;aok-hidden&quot;,&quot;selector&quot;:&quot;#customer_review-R39XRRPF81FPZG .cr-truncated-content, #customer_review-R39XRRPF81FPZG .cr-full-content&quot;}"><a data-hook="redirect-see-more" aria-label="Toggle full review text" class="a-link-normal a-nowrap a-text-normal" href="/gp/aw/review/B09TKLK5HM/R39XRRPF81FPZG/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_rvw_tr?ie=UTF8"><span class="a-size-base cr-read-more">See more</span></a></span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-full-content aok-hidden"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
I bought my partner a Asus laptop thirteen years ago which still works perfectly so thought I'd buy one for myself!<br />The laptop appears to be very well built and runs windows 11 (which I dislike immensely) with ease. I think it would be more than adequate for most users who mainly run microsoft office and the like.<br />It is very quiet, has decent graphics and is more than fast enough.<br />Very good machine at a very reasonable price.
</span></div></span>

If it doesn’t, we’ll remove it.</p></div><div class="a-row"><div class="a-column a-span12 a-spacing-top-base"><span class="a-button a-button-primary"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="https://www.amazon.co.uk/ap/signin?openid.return_to=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.co.uk%2Fdp%2FB09TKLK5HM%2Fref%3Dcm_cr_dp_mb_tr%3Fie%3DUTF8%26csrfT%3DhCKsTb6muzqAAlE6K9xxdNkZ1uDSMRU7HAMoxK2vx4YeAAAAAGbCL94AAAAB%26reviewId%3DR39XRRPF81FPZG%23R39XRRPF81FPZG&amp;openid.identity=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&amp;openid.assoc_handle=gbflex&amp;openid.mode=checkid_setup&amp;marketPlaceId=A1F83G8C2ARO7P&amp;language=en&amp;openid.claimed_id=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&amp;openid.ns=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0" class="a-button-text">Submit</a></span></span></div></div></div></div>
<a id="mobley-report-abusive-review-button-unsigned-in" data-hook="report-abusive-review-button-unsigned-in" class="a-link-normal" href="https://www.amazon.co.uk/ap/signin?openid.return_to=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.co.uk%2Fdp%2FB09TKLK5HM%2Fref%3Dcm_cr_dp_mb_tr%3Fie%3DUTF8%23R39XRRPF81FPZG&amp;openid.identity=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&amp;openid.assoc_handle=gbflex&amp;openid.mode=checkid_setup&amp;marketPlaceId=A1F83G8C2ARO7P&amp;language=en&amp;openid.claimed_id=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&amp;openid.ns=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0"><span class="a-size-base a-color-secondary cr-report-component">Report</span></a></div></div></div></div><div id="R3EYWRFJCOW0UD" data-hook="mobley-review-content" class="a-section a-spacing-large aok-relative"><div data-hook="genome-widget" class="a-row"><a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AG3CLWVSZPFFAJB7CYTLHNPOYJXQ/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_gw_tr?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX110_.png"/><noscript><img src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX110_.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Edy</span></div></a></div><div id="customer_review-R3EYWRFJCOW0UD" class="a-section celwidget"><div class="a-row a-spacing-micro a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star-small a-star-small-4 review-rating aok-align-center"><span class="a-icon-alt">4.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span data-hook="msrp-avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></div><span data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base review-title-content a-color-base a-text-bold">
<span>Very beautiful visuals but...</span>
</span><div data-hook="review-by-line" class="a-row a-spacing-none reviewByLine"><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary review-date">Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 May 2024</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary">Style Name: F1505ZA OLED<i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Configuration: Intel i5-12500H + 16GB RAM + 512GB SSD</span></div><span class="cr-original-truncatable-content">
<div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-truncated-content"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
Let me start by saying that overall I love this laptop. It looks very classy. Pros: very bright, vivid colours. You can and should dim the brightness a bit. OLED screen means no washed out colours, black is really black, not grey. The white is also immaculate. The...
</span><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-declarative" data-action="reviews:toggle-class:click" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-reviews:toggle-class:click" data-reviews:toggle-class:click="{&quot;cssClass&quot;:&quot;aok-hidden&quot;,&quot;selector&quot;:&quot;#customer_review-R3EYWRFJCOW0UD .cr-truncated-content, #customer_review-R3EYWRFJCOW0UD .cr-full-content&quot;}"><a data-hook="redirect-see-more" aria-label="Toggle full review text" class="a-link-normal a-nowrap a-text-normal" href="/gp/aw/review/B09TKLK5HM/R3EYWRFJCOW0UD/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_rvw_tr?ie=UTF8"><span class="a-size-base cr-read-more">See more</span></a></span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-full-content aok-hidden"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
Let me start by saying that overall I love this laptop. It looks very classy.<br />Pros: very bright, vivid colours. You can and should dim the brightness a bit. OLED screen means no washed out colours, black is really black, not grey. The white is also immaculate. The colour palette is really extended. The sound is awesome, both on speakers and in headphones. Very snappy due to its fast processor. The keyboard is backlit (this can be disabled) and depending on how lit it is around you this can be a plus or a drawback.<br />Cons: As I mentioned, in a normal properly lit or bright environment the keyboard backlit is actually bad, it makes it harder to see the keys. I press thrice F7 key to disable it. The screen being OLED and the processor ("H" type) juicing out max performance out of the laptop means the battery life is not great. Depending on what programs/games you run I think it can hold the charge to a max of about 4 hours, maybe a bit more. I used all the recommended Windows power settings and I lowered the brightness to a level of 60 (good enough), also using dark themes. There are some settings in MyASUS preinstalled software that can protect/extend the battery life (e.g. not charging over 80%) If not, the battery will drain fast. And I don't like the glare of the screen, in a bright day I see more of myself reflected from the screen than its content.<br />Awesome price considering the specs, so if you don't mind these negatives the laptop looks and performs great.<br /><br />EDIT: I believed at first that the laptop is overheating. I had a few instances when it  suddenly just shutdown and the laptop was hot. The problem was that I was using my laptop on my bed, there was no space under the laptop for the air to flow freely. That's why it was overheating. I placed it on a stand, still on the bed, lots of room under the laptop, now it doesn't overheat and shutdown anymore.
</span></div></span>
<div class="a-row cr-vote"><div class="a-row a-spacing-small"><span data-hook="helpful-vote-statement" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary cr-vote-text">44 people found this helpful</span></div><div class="a-row cr-vote-action-bar"><!-- Components for Reactions C -->

<a id="mobley-report-abusive-review-button-unsigned-in" data-hook="report-abusive-review-button-unsigned-in" class="a-link-normal" href="https://www.amazon.co.uk/ap/signin?openid.return_to=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.co.uk%2Fdp%2FB09TKLK5HM%2Fref%3Dcm_cr_dp_mb_tr%3Fie%3DUTF8%23R3EYWRFJCOW0UD&amp;openid.identity=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&amp;openid.assoc_handle=gbflex&amp;openid.mode=checkid_setup&amp;marketPlaceId=A1F83G8C2ARO7P&amp;language=en&amp;openid.claimed_id=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&amp;openid.ns=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0"><span class="a-size-base a-color-secondary cr-report-component">Report</span></a></div></div></div></div><div id="R6LDB968RWQAF" data-hook="mobley-review-content" class="a-section a-spacing-large aok-relative"><div data-hook="genome-widget" class="a-row"><a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AEBT3WSLGJGOMXLCRIOQE6UPOINQ/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_gw_tr?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/7fb1f8d3-70c4-4738-a77d-85bd61dbbdfc._CR0,0,500,500_SX110_.jpg"/><noscript><img src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/7fb1f8d3-70c4-4738-a77d-85bd61dbbdfc._CR0,0,500,500_SX110_.jpg"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">CraigMinds</span></div></a></div><div id="customer_review-R6LDB968RWQAF" class="a-section celwidget"><div class="a-row a-spacing-micro a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star-small a-star-small-5 review-rating aok-align-center"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span data-hook="msrp-avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></div><span data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base review-title-content a-color-base a-text-bold">
<span>Laptop for browsing</span>
</span><div data-hook="review-by-line" class="a-row a-spacing-none reviewByLine"><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary review-date">Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 January 2024</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary">Style Name: X515JA<i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Configuration: Intel i3-1005G1 + 8GB RAM + 256GB SSD</span></div><span class="cr-original-truncatable-content">
<div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-truncated-content"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
I recently purchased the ASUS VivoBook 15 X515JA, and I am pleased with its performance, especially considering its reasonable price. This laptop is a fantastic choice for everyday use, particularly for browsing the internet and watching videos. The 15.6-inch...
</span><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-declarative" data-action="reviews:toggle-class:click" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-reviews:toggle-class:click" data-reviews:toggle-class:click="{&quot;cssClass&quot;:&quot;aok-hidden&quot;,&quot;selector&quot;:&quot;#customer_review-R6LDB968RWQAF .cr-truncated-content, #customer_review-R6LDB968RWQAF .cr-full-content&quot;}"><a data-hook="redirect-see-more" aria-label="Toggle full review text" class="a-link-normal a-nowrap a-text-normal" href="/gp/aw/review/B09TKLK5HM/R6LDB968RWQAF/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_rvw_tr?ie=UTF8"><span class="a-size-base cr-read-more">See more</span></a></span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-full-content aok-hidden"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
I recently purchased the ASUS VivoBook 15 X515JA, and I am pleased with its performance, especially considering its reasonable price. This laptop is a fantastic choice for everyday use, particularly for browsing the internet and watching videos.<br /><br />The 15.6-inch Full HD display is vibrant and sharp, providing an excellent viewing experience. Whether I'm scrolling through websites, watching YouTube videos, or streaming my favorite shows, the colors are vivid, and the details are clear.<br /><br />Powered by an i3 processor and 8GB of RAM, the VivoBook 15 handles everyday tasks with ease. Browsing the internet is smooth and responsive, even with multiple tabs open. It boots up quickly, and I've experienced no lag when switching between applications.<br /><br />The 256GB SSD has fast read and write speeds. It not only ensures quick system responsiveness but also offers ample space for storing documents, photos, and videos. While it may not be the largest storage capacity, it's sufficient for my needs, and the speed is a significant plus.<br /><br />The laptop offers a variety of ports, including USB-A, USB-C, HDMI, and a microSD card slot. This versatility makes it easy to connect to external devices and expand the laptop's capabilities.<br /><br />The ASUS SonicMaster audio technology delivers surprisingly good sound quality for a laptop in this price range.
</span></div></span>
<div class="a-row cr-vote"><div class="a-row a-spacing-small"><span data-hook="helpful-vote-statement" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary cr-vote-text">57 people found this helpful</span></div><div class="a-row cr-vote-action-bar"><!-- Components for Reactions C -->

<a id="mobley-report-abusive-review-button-unsigned-in" data-hook="report-abusive-review-button-unsigned-in" class="a-link-normal" href="https://www.amazon.co.uk/ap/signin?openid.return_to=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.co.uk%2Fdp%2FB09TKLK5HM%2Fref%3Dcm_cr_dp_mb_tr%3Fie%3DUTF8%23R6LDB968RWQAF&amp;openid.identity=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&amp;openid.assoc_handle=gbflex&amp;openid.mode=checkid_setup&amp;marketPlaceId=A1F83G8C2ARO7P&amp;language=en&amp;openid.claimed_id=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&amp;openid.ns=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0"><span class="a-size-base a-color-secondary cr-report-component">Report</span></a></div></div></div></div><div id="R26NG0OHPEOKIJ" data-hook="mobley-review-content" class="a-section a-spacing-large aok-relative"><div data-hook="genome-widget" class="a-row"><a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AFPNW25MLH5XCEMI7RFAZJLUVTTA/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_gw_tr?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX110_.png"/><noscript><img src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX110_.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Family</span></div></a></div><div id="customer_review-R26NG0OHPEOKIJ" class="a-section celwidget"><div class="a-row a-spacing-micro a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star-small a-star-small-5 review-rating aok-align-center"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span data-hook="msrp-avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></div><span data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base review-title-content a-color-base a-text-bold">
<span>Bargain in November</span>
</span><div data-hook="review-by-line" class="a-row a-spacing-none reviewByLine"><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary review-date">Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 January 2023</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary">Style Name: X515JA<i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Configuration: Intel i5-1035G1 + 8GB RAM + 256GB SSD</span></div><span class="cr-original-truncatable-content">
<div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-truncated-content"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
I have an old Packard Bell TJ65 that's done me 10 years plus, I have to remove the keyboard (Stuck with velcro) then use a screwdriver to short a power up as the power button failed and a real pain to replace but it still works and for an old girl it is fine for me, BUT not...
</span><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-declarative" data-action="reviews:toggle-class:click" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-reviews:toggle-class:click" data-reviews:toggle-class:click="{&quot;cssClass&quot;:&quot;aok-hidden&quot;,&quot;selector&quot;:&quot;#customer_review-R26NG0OHPEOKIJ .cr-truncated-content, #customer_review-R26NG0OHPEOKIJ .cr-full-content&quot;}"><a data-hook="redirect-see-more" aria-label="Toggle full review text" class="a-link-normal a-nowrap a-text-normal" href="/gp/aw/review/B09TKLK5HM/R26NG0OHPEOKIJ/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_rvw_tr?ie=UTF8"><span class="a-size-base cr-read-more">See more</span></a></span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-full-content aok-hidden"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
I have an old Packard Bell TJ65 that's done me 10 years plus, I have to remove the keyboard (Stuck with velcro) then use a screwdriver to short a power up as the power button failed and a real pain to replace but it still works and for an old girl it is fine for me, BUT not for the rest of the family!  The old TJ65 has an amazing shiny crystal clear screen as competed with the old Sony cinema laptops, but it is so flippin noisy it drives me mad and I installed a fan control software to quieten it down.<br /><br />So I waited for Black Friday as I do my TV and Mobile requirements and this Asus laptop popped up very early on on Amazon before the sales started and I snapped it for £329.  I bought a Crucial RAM 8GB DDR4 3200MHz in the sale for £20 which simply slots in, apart from undoing some screws on back of laptop it was simples, just plug and play, re-screw and done, upgraded Ram to 16GB.  I am not a nerd or a techy, I don't even know if I have done any good, but I feckin hate newspaper websites that kill my laptops and this has done the trick.<br /><br />The Asus is really fast, very very quick starting, I have 3 profiles for family and it's bullet fast.  The screen is not as good as my old TJ65 but you getz what you pay for and it's fine for what it has to do.  If you need a seriously good screen then you need to dig deep right.  It is light to carry, the hinges are not looking to be the strongest so will be careful and not take the Michael.  But what I really love about it is it is silent, so silent I worry something is not right, I have a £1900 HP work laptop 3 months old and is noisy compared to this Asus!  The battery is fine, it lasts for hours and I have never yet had to run for a charger, it is absolutely reliable and suspect that's because it does not have an energy thirsty fan panging away..<br /><br />The only downside is a real cheap keyboard, my HP is back-lit and posh, this is button press, twang and noisy as you type, but actually, for an old fart like me, it actually helps as I don't mistype as much!<br /><br />So I am sorry for the wordy review, I don't do many, but it's a definite yes from me and I would buy another, if I got some amazingly well paid job that meant i needed another, but I guess I have 3 laptops now so by default have a great job, unfortunately not in the pay scale department!!
</span></div></span>
<div class="a-row cr-vote"><div class="a-row a-spacing-small"><span data-hook="helpful-vote-statement" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary cr-vote-text">159 people found this helpful</span></div><div class="a-row cr-vote-action-bar"><!-- Components for Reactions C -->

aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" class="a-profile-name">Tecumseh</span></div></a></div><div id="customer_review-RWQW2U5G76RY3" class="a-section celwidget"><div class="a-row a-spacing-micro a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star-small a-star-small-5 review-rating aok-align-center"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span data-hook="msrp-avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></div><span data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base review-title-content a-color-base a-text-bold">
<span>Excellent performance</span>
</span><div data-hook="review-by-line" class="a-row a-spacing-none reviewByLine"><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary review-date">Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 July 2024</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary">Style Name: X1505ZA OLED<i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Configuration: Intel i5-12500H + 16GB RAM + 1TB SSD</span></div><span class="cr-original-truncatable-content">
<div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-truncated-content"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
First I ordered a USED one. It arrived on time, looked really great but the power button did not start up the Laptop. So I had to send it back. After two weeks of waiting for my refund, It got stacked in the Amazon mail centre, so I called Amazon support line, and got my...
</span><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-declarative" data-action="reviews:toggle-class:click" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-reviews:toggle-class:click" data-reviews:toggle-class:click="{&quot;cssClass&quot;:&quot;aok-hidden&quot;,&quot;selector&quot;:&quot;#customer_review-RWQW2U5G76RY3 .cr-truncated-content, #customer_review-RWQW2U5G76RY3 .cr-full-content&quot;}"><a data-hook="redirect-see-more" aria-label="Toggle full review text" class="a-link-normal a-nowrap a-text-normal" href="/gp/aw/review/B09TKLK5HM/RWQW2U5G76RY3/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_rvw_tr?ie=UTF8"><span class="a-size-base cr-read-more">See more</span></a></span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-full-content aok-hidden"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
First I ordered a USED one. It arrived on time, looked really great but the power button did not start up the Laptop. So I had to send it back. After two weeks of waiting for my refund, It got stacked in the Amazon mail centre, so I called Amazon support line, and got my refund within 3 days.<br />I really liked the design and the price of the Laptop, so I bought again, but a New one. It Arrived even before the day it supposed to. But not a silver colour as it is advertised, but black colour. This time the Laptop start up.<br />Finally I am satisfied. The Laptop has excellent smooth and fast performance for a mid budget laptop, due to the Intel I5 -12500H, fast SSDi drive and 16 gb RAM. The Processor is extremely fast. On benchmark site , it has one of the highest rating of all mid class processors. The laptop has very good display and sound. I like the camera cover.<br />In general I am very satisfied, due to its performance. So far the fastest and smoothest Laptop I have ever had. It can do lot of tasks at the same time, which is what I need .
</span></div></span>

aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">jimjam</span></div></a></div><div id="customer_review-REPQ5M91YFFXV" class="a-section celwidget"><div class="a-row a-spacing-micro a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star-small a-star-small-3 review-rating aok-align-center"><span class="a-icon-alt">3.0 out of 5 stars</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span data-hook="msrp-avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></div><span data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base review-title-content a-color-base a-text-bold">
<span>Very fast, nice keyboard, average display, noisy fan</span>
</span><div data-hook="review-by-line" class="a-row a-spacing-none reviewByLine"><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary review-date">Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 February 2024</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary">Style Name: X1504ZA<i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Configuration: Intel i7-1255U + 8GB RAM + 512GB SSD</span></div><span class="cr-original-truncatable-content">
<div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-truncated-content"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
I have had several ASUS laptops over the last few years and have been generally pleased with them. This one is decent (but not perfect) - still good value for price. ( i7 / 8GB RAM / 512 SSD / backlit keyboard) Pros: - very...
</span><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-declarative" data-action="reviews:toggle-class:click" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-reviews:toggle-class:click" data-reviews:toggle-class:click="{&quot;cssClass&quot;:&quot;aok-hidden&quot;,&quot;selector&quot;:&quot;#customer_review-REPQ5M91YFFXV .cr-truncated-content, #customer_review-REPQ5M91YFFXV .cr-full-content&quot;}"><a data-hook="redirect-see-more" aria-label="Toggle full review text" class="a-link-normal a-nowrap a-text-normal" href="/gp/aw/review/B09TKLK5HM/REPQ5M91YFFXV/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_rvw_tr?ie=UTF8"><span class="a-size-base cr-read-more">See more</span></a></span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-full-content aok-hidden"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
I have had several ASUS laptops over the last few years and have been generally pleased with them.<br /><br />This one is decent (but not perfect) - still good value for price.<br /><br />( i7 / 8GB RAM / 512 SSD / backlit keyboard)<br /><br />Pros:<br /><br />- very fast<br />- solid keyboard, backlighting is excellent and a must-have for my purposes (laptop used in low light at times)<br /><br />Cons:<br /><br />- display is average but usable, typical of a LCD but I wonder if I should have paid more for OLED (although I understand they are not perfect either)<br />- fan is easily triggered by even low CPU load and a little noisy<br /><br />Haven't tested battery life.<br /><br />Overall, good value for money. Nice balance between performance and price.
</span></div></span>

<div class="a-section a-padding-large"><div class="a-row"><p class="a-text-bold">Report this review</p></div><div class="a-row"><p class="a-spacing-top-base">Optional: Why are you reporting this?</p></div><div class="a-fixed-left-grid a-spacing-top-base"><div class="a-fixed-left-grid-inner a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><div class="a-fixed-left-grid-col a-col-left" class="a-letter-space"></span><span data-hook="msrp-avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></div><span data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base review-title-content a-color-base a-text-bold">
<span>Best for watching videos!</span>
</span><div data-hook="review-by-line" class="a-row a-spacing-none reviewByLine"><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary review-date">Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 July 2024</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini a-grid-vertical-align a-grid-center"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-size-small a-color-tertiary">Style Name: X1505ZA OLED<i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i>Configuration: Intel i5-12500H + 16GB RAM + 1TB SSD</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-base a-spacing-top-medium">

</span>
</div><span class="cr-original-truncatable-content">
<div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-truncated-content"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
Unlike others, I didn't experience any overheating with this laptop. Overall, I find it very classy. Took 10 min. to set up Windows OS which is included as well as MS antivirus - so great value. Pros: Very...
</span><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-declarative" data-action="reviews:toggle-class:click" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-reviews:toggle-class:click" data-reviews:toggle-class:click="{&quot;cssClass&quot;:&quot;aok-hidden&quot;,&quot;selector&quot;:&quot;#customer_review-R3NZ9AQZSJLYAZ .cr-truncated-content, #customer_review-R3NZ9AQZSJLYAZ .cr-full-content&quot;}"><a data-hook="redirect-see-more" aria-label="Toggle full review text" class="a-link-normal a-nowrap a-text-normal" href="/gp/aw/review/B09TKLK5HM/R3NZ9AQZSJLYAZ/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_rvw_tr?ie=UTF8"><span class="a-size-base cr-read-more">See more</span></a></span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small cr-full-content aok-hidden"><span data-hook="review-body" class="review-text-sub-contents">
Unlike others, I didn't experience any overheating with this laptop. Overall, I find it very classy. Took 10 min. to set up Windows OS which is included as well as MS antivirus - so great value.<br /><br />Pros:<br /><br />Very bright, vivid colors; you can and should dim the brightness a bit.<br />OLED screen 600nits ensures no washed-out colors; blacks are really black, not grey, and whites are immaculate!<br />Great sound quality, both on speakers and headphones.<br />Very snappy performance due to its fast processor, if you take top spec.<br />Stable wifi receiver<br /><br />Cons:<br /><br />In well-lit environments, the backlit keyboard can make it harder to see the keys; can be disabled with F7 key.<br />OLED screen and powerful "H" type processor lead to short battery life, lasting a maximum about 4-6 hours depending on usage.<br />The screen's glare is an issue in bright conditions; reflections can be distracting.<br /><br />Conclusion:<br />The laptop offers excellent specs at a great price. If you can manage the battery life and glare issues, it looks and performs wonderfully, especially for watching videos.<br /><br />p.s. It comes with 1 yr warranty - must be registered with the SN on asus website.
</span></div></span>

</span><div class="a-section"><div class="a-box a-box-normal a-color-offset-background a-text-left"><div class="a-box-inner a-padding-medium"><h4 class="a-spacing-mini">How customer reviews and ratings work</h4><p class="a-spacing-mini">Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings, help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.<span class="a-letter-space"></span><a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_mb_omni_lm_btn?nodeId=G8UYX7LALQC8V9KA">Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon</a></p></div></div></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
'use strict';
(function () {
function install() {
var searchIconLink = document.getElementById('search-icon-link');
if (searchIconLink) {
searchIconLink.onclick = function(e) {
var refStartPos = this.href.lastIndexOf('#');
if (refStartPos > 0 && refStartPos < this.href.length - 1) {
var searchBox = document.getElementById(this.href.substring(refStartPos + 1));
if (searchBox) {
searchBox.focus();
e.preventDefault();
}
}
};
}
}
if (document.readyState === "complete") { install(); }
else { window.addEventListener('load', install); }
}());
</script>

<script type ="text/javascript">
if(typeof performance!= "undefined" && typeof performance.getEntries != "undefined") {

    for(i = 0 ; i < performance.getEntries().length ; i++){
        var name = performance.getEntries()[i].name ;
        var res = name.match(/\.css\?AUIClients\/AmazonUI/g);
        var initiatorType = performance.getEntries()[i].initiatorType;        

        if(res && initiatorType && initiatorType == "link"){
            var duration = performance.getEntries()[i].duration ;
            ue.count("aui.duration", duration); 
            ue.count("aui.startTime", performance.getEntries()[i].startTime);
            if(duration < 50){ csmTag = "auiCached";}
            else{ csmTag = "auiNotCached";}

            if(window.ue && ue.tag) { ue.tag(csmTag);}
            break;
        }
    }

    var metaAssetNames = [];
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageMetaAssetFixed");
      metaAssetNames.push("AmazonUICalendar");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageEverywhereMetaAsset");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageOffersDebugAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("InContextDetailPageAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("GiftingDetailPageBuzzAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageMobileWebCriticalFeatureAsset_BUYX_DP_RPCX_MOBINLINE_SUBASSETING_954855");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageMobileWebDefaultMetaAsset_asset_segregation_BUYX_DP_RPCX_TPLUS_SUBASSETING_897079");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageMobileWebDefaultStableAsset");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageMobileWebNonSoftlinesMetaAsset");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageMobileWebDefaultOnlyAsset");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageAllOffersDisplayAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("GoldboxUDPAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("GestaltDetailPageMobileWebMetaAsset");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageMediaMatrixFullBottomSheetAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("InstallmentPaymentDetailPageMetaAsset");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPagePostPurchaseAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageCustomerReviewsAttributeAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageNostosAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("BuyItOnABUIAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageQuestAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("GiftingDetailPageBuzzAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageAlohaAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageWirelessPlansAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPagePostPurchaseAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("InstallmentPaymentDetailPageMetaAsset");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPagePriceTrackerAssets");
      metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageABSMultiSelectionAssets");

    P.when('load').execute("log-dpjs-resource-timing", function(){

      function logCSSResourceTiming(metaAssetName, dpEntry) {
        ue.count("dpcssma.duration:" + metaAssetName, dpEntry.duration);
        if(dpmaDuration < 50) {
          ue.tag("dpcssmaCached:" + metaAssetName);
        } else {
          ue.tag("dpcssmaNotCached:" + metaAssetName);
        }
        ue.count("dpcssma.startTime:" + metaAssetName, dpEntry.startTime);
      }

      function logJSResourceTiming(metaAssetName, dpJSEntry) {
        ue.count("dpjsma.duration:" + metaAssetName, dpJSEntry.duration);
        if(dpmaDuration < 50) {
          ue.tag("dpjsmaCached:" + metaAssetName);
        } else {
          ue.tag("dpjsmaNotCached:" + metaAssetName);
        }
        ue.count("dpjsma.startTime:" + metaAssetName, dpJSEntry.startTime);
      }


      var dpEntries = performance.getEntries();
      if(metaAssetNames.length > 0)  {
        for(assetIndex = 0; assetIndex < metaAssetNames.length; assetIndex ++) {
          var metaAssetName = metaAssetNames[assetIndex];
          var cssRE = new RegExp("\\.css\\?AUIClients/" + metaAssetName); 
          var jsRE = new RegExp("\\.js\\?AUIClients/" + metaAssetName); 
          var jsMatched = 0, cssMatched = 0;
          
          for(i = 0 ; i < dpEntries.length; i++) {
            var dpEntry  = dpEntries[i];
            var dpmaDuration = dpEntry.duration;
            var jsRes = dpEntry.name.match(jsRE);
            var cssRes = dpEntry.name.match(cssRE);

            if(!cssMatched && cssRes && dpEntry.initiatorType && dpEntry.initiatorType == "link") {
                logCSSResourceTiming(metaAssetName, dpEntry);
                cssMatched = 1;
            }

            if (!jsMatched && jsRes && dpEntry.initiatorType && dpEntry.initiatorType == "script") {
                logJSResourceTiming(metaAssetName, dpEntry);
                jsMatched = 1;
            }

            if(cssMatched && jsMatched) {
                break;
            }
          }
        }
      }

      for(i = 0 ; i < dpEntries.length ; i++){
          var entry = dpEntries[i];     
          var name = entry.name ;
          var AUIAssetsMatched = false;
          var jQueryAssetsMatched = false;
          var csmTag = "";
          var res = name.match(/\.js\?AUIClients\/AmazonUI/g);  
          var jQRes = name.match(/\.js\?AUIClients\/AmazonUIjQuery/g);  

          if(entry.initiatorType && entry.initiatorType == "script"){

              if(jQRes){
                  ue.count("aui.jQuery.duration", entry.duration); 
                  ue.count("aui.jQuery.startTime", entry.startTime);
                  if(entry.duration < 50) { 
                      csmTag = "auijQueryCached";
                  } else { 
                      csmTag = "auijQueryNotCached";
                  }

                  jQueryAssetsMatched = true;
                  if(window.ue && ue.tag) { ue.tag(csmTag);}            
              } 
              else if(res){
                  ue.count("aui.js.duration", entry.duration); 
                  ue.count("aui.js.startTime", entry.startTime);
                  if(entry.duration < 50) { 
                      csmTag = "auiJSCached";
                  } else { 
                      csmTag = "auiJSNotCached";
                  }

                  AUIAssetsMatched = true;
                  if(window.ue && ue.tag) { ue.tag(csmTag);}            
              } 

              if(AUIAssetsMatched && jQueryAssetsMatched){
                  break;
              }
          }
      }

    });
}
</script>
    
</div>

    var component = 'navCF';
    try {
      (window.AmazonUIPageJS ? AmazonUIPageJS : P).register(component, function(){return {};});
    }
    catch(e) {
      var error = e.message.toLowerCase();
      var alreadyRegisteredMsg = component + ' already registered';

      if (error.indexOf(alreadyRegisteredMsg.toLowerCase()) === -1) {
        throw(e);
      }
    }
</script>
